name: Milk
description: Fresh, wholesome milk… naturally from Neilson. Since 1893, Neilson has stood for high quality dairy products. Neilson has always been committed to using the best ingredients, people and processes to produce great tasting quality milk you can depend on.

name: Yogurt
description: Enjoy the delicate sweetness of vanilla and the juiciness of ruby-red strawberries 100% Natural Source Ingredients. Made with 100% Canadian milk.

name: Candy
description: Every pack of Skittles gives you the chance to Taste the Rainbow, creating a taste sensation that makes even the most stoic of unicorns smile.

name: Cookies
description: Made with creamery butter and the maximum number of chocolate chips that we could cram in, these are still our best selling cookies after 28 years!
